title: [Bug]: Unable to sign in when my login provider is godaddy
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

I sign into the microsoft portal using my work email

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.11 (via pop shop)

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
After entering my email I am taken to GoDaddy to enter password.

GoDaddy then says my login looks suspicious and asks to turn off extensions, turn off vpn, and enable JS.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
I should be able to sign in
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/804b4dcf-cef5-4218-ba70-7668db789ec9)
